name: Ball-ble
description: Why not use yarn to knit more yarn? Ball-ble is a little bit silly but very cute and fun. Twisted rib and travelling stitches create a yarn-like texture on the tiniest ball of yarn you ever did see.
full_text: Why not use yarn to knit more yarn? Ball-ble is a little bit silly but very cute and fun. Twisted rib and travelling stitches create a yarn-like texture on the tiniest ball of yarn you ever did see. YARN: oddments of fingering / 4ply weight yarn. GAUGE: n/a NEEDLES & NOTIONS: 2.5mm DPNs (Note: you could also use a long circular needle for magic loop, but since the pattern is worked in 3 sections, it lends itself to DPNs) Stitch markers Tapestry needle Card for ‘ballband’ Stuffing SIZING: finished bauble measures approx 3.25 “ / 8 cm tall. @lilykatemakes | #Ball -ble
